values:
Charter of the Democratic Party of the United States of America

We, the Democrats of the United States of America, united in common purpose, hereby rededicate
ourselves to the principles which have historically sustained our Party.  Recognizing that the vitality of the
Nation's political institutions has been the foundation of its enduring strength, we acknowledge that a
political party which wishes to lead must listen to those it would lead, a party which asks for the people's
trust must prove that it trusts the people and a party which hopes to call forth the best the Nation can
achieve must embody the best of the Nation's heritage and traditions.
What we seek for our Nation, we hope for all people:  individual freedom in the framework of a just
society, political freedom in the framework of meaningful participation by all citizens.  Bound by the United
States Constitution, aware that a party must be responsive to be worthy of responsibility, we pledge
ourselves to open, honest endeavor and to the conduct of public affairs in a manner worthy of a society of
free people.
Under God, and for these ends and upon these principles, we do establish and adopt this Charter of the
Democratic Party of the United States of America.

Definitions from Websters Dictionary

Freedom: the quality or state of being free: as a: the absence of necessity, coercion, or constraint in choice or action 
Listen: to hear something with thoughtful attention : give consideration 
Honesty: fairness and straightforwardness of conduct

The democratic party is supposed to be a party of civil liberties, freedom, and listening to the voices of its voters.  By now some of you may have seen the infamous "Debra Ad" http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=597YG23mAWs
What most of you probably don't know is that this ad is probably the most obvious sign of the Democratic party not listening to it's own membership.  First of all it should be noted that the ad itself is a little misleading, in that it doesn't give any of the information about why she made her choice to switch to John McCain, all of which would only help his case, but then again American's don't like to actually think for themselves.  
Here was happened in a short simple version.  Debra was a "Pledged" delegate to the DNC (Democratic National Convention).  For those of you who don't know what the hell that means I will explain.  When you vote in a primary you are voting in a private non-government election.  Your vote is then used to appoint pledged delegates.  These people are required by party rules to vote the way you wanted at the DNC for the first Ballot, unless of course your candidate drops out ie; John Edwards.  Then on the second ballot if no winner is found they may vote thier conscience, and so on until a winner is selected.  This time around Hilary did not drop out so her delegates must cast thier vote at the DNC.  Debra, notably form wisconsin, was going to vote for Hilary every time there was a ballot, but if the party did end up selected Barak Obama then she stated in November, months after her role as delegate had ended, she would vote for John McCain.  There is nothing wrong with this woman having an opinion like that.  In fact the Democratic party according to thier charter would seem to support this very idea.  Yet she had her delegate status revoked because she shared that opinion.  Full article here: http://www.jsonline.com/story/index.aspx?id=762052
Lets be clear I am not arguing she should sue or anything like that, or even that the party shouldn't be allowed to do this thing.  What bothers me is that a party of "principles" can set them aside just because something is said that they don't agree with.  That is something Republicans would do.  Furthermore it is something that Democrats have activily derided the Republican Party for doing.  Basically what I am saying is that this is a party that is so obsessed with winning it will do anything at this point.  Which is to be expected.  So much for Hope and Change, unless you are hoping the Democratic party will change into a totalitarian regime which opposes freedom of expression, opinion, and representation.

One final note this action was by the Democratic Party not Obama, so this shouldn't neccesarily reflect on him.

I was sitting in one of my early morning theatre classes when I notice that one of the women in the class has absolutely killer legs.  I had seen her in class before and never noticed her legs before.  She had worn similar pants on previous days and yet still I had never noticed them.  I brushed this thought aside as just simple hormone spike in my body.  Then of course another young woman in my class rounds the stage and I can't help but stare at her chest.  It was like for the briefest of moments that was all that mattered to my brain.  Now this gets me to thinking what the hell is wrong with me.  I have a incredibly beautiful girlfriend who leaves me breathless in the mornings when she leaves for work.  Each night I lay down next to here and am in ecstasy over the feel of her skin against mine.  So, why do I still look at other women.  I don't mean in the fleeting "Oh wow sort of way"  I mean in the full on "physical" crush sort of way.  Why does my body suddenly think "I must have sex with that woman"  In a really visceral way it imposes its will on me.  My rational mind always manages to make me be-halve, my emotional spirit keeps me grounded and safeguards my heart, but my sexual drive is completely unfaithful.  Why does this happen.  
As many of you probably know I have some debate on the matter of Monogamy.  It isn't that I am opposed to it, its more like I don't understand the point.  As stated above my heart and mind are thoroughly committed to my relationship with my girlfriend, but my sex drive has no such preclusions.  Is it possible to have an open sexual relationship while having a committed monogamous emotional relationship.  I am not pushing for one by any means.  I am very satisfied with my lover, All that being true, why do I still feel an incredibly strong physical pull to bed other women.  Is monogamy on a physical level really just a antiquated idea predicated on us by religious sect some 500 years ago.  A sect which ultimately couldn't even live up to it's own edicts.  Maybe I am just being too analytical.
So I guess what I am getting at is how many other people feel this same very real very powerful force to sleep with other people besides their respective other?  Do you keep it controlled?  Why do you control it?  Anyone out there manage to shut this feeling off?  Do you look at porn and/or masturbate as a control measure?  Is it a valid control measure?  Why do you think you feel this way?

How is everyone doing.  I amsitting here realizing that in my new job I have forgotten to inform anyone of what is really going on with me.  Furthermore, I haven't been informed on any of my friends lives.  It really isn't fair of me to always expect you to make the effort to come out and tell me how things are going on with you.  So here goes.  The rules for this post are simple.  I want good information on how your life is going, whats new and possible dates where we should see each other.  

A few notes on me.  I work 45 hours a week now, go to school full time, but I make my own work schedule so if you give me two weeks notcie I can usally make it happen.  Lastly don't even try for wed nights, I just can't do it.

Dave the moron who needs to find more time for everyone

PS: BECCA I miss you alot.

I stumbled upon a post in a journal I want to rip to shreds.  Its offensive and should be attacked, but I can't.  My stone walls of defense seem to still be a bit to thick....
Yeah that doesn't make any sense to anyone does it.
If there is at least one person in your life whom you consider a close friend, and whom you would not have met without the internet, post this sentence in your journal.

I was trying to decide what it is that I want to talk about today in my lj and I hit on the idea of further exploring the fitz delema.  Now first off I want make a quick note to anyone reading this journal entry or the previous one for that matter.  Fitz can read this journal anytime he wants.  I know that all of my public entries have been available to him for some time now.  I actually might still have is comments on a block list so I will have to check into that.  Anyway on to my thoughts for the day.

Me and Fitz used to be really close.  For a time we even practiced the gift together, but a force came between us.  I can't name this force for sure.  I have blamed him and I am sure he has blamed me.  Essentially we haven't actually spoken to each other in more then 4 years.  The last year of our communications were through LJ or other online media.  There are many reasons for the break down and I won't go into them here.  I was meditating the other day and I kept seeing fitz's face.  My meditations are no longer haunted by the wanderings of a stalker so usually I find them peacefull.  however this was my first time meditating in nearly two years so who knows what my spirit needed to express.  I don't like the feeling that there is something I am supposed to know but can't quite touch.  I have read his journal recently and nothing in it made any clear connections between us.  So I guess I should just leave a sleeping dog lie.

Anyone with imput, whether you know the situation or not is welcome to offer thier thoughts.

Dave

Maybe I am regressing back to a former self.  Perhaps I am feeling nostalgic.  Possibly I am living in a happy land where you all still use this service.  Regardless of the reasoning behind my decision, I am returning to LJ.  I miss what I used to have in my online world.  I miss the contact I had with all of you and I am going to try to fix a few things.  But first I have some really unimportant questions I really must ask.  If you read this and have any opinion on the matter please give me some feedback.

Question 1: Should I contact Fitz?  I have been mulling this over for sometime now.  I want to repair my broken bridges but I don't want to open to that kind of rancid pain again.  What are your thoughts.

Question 2: How should I proceed?  I am considering just opening this LJ up, adding all of you who view my journal as my friend, contacting everyone on my AIM, calling everyone in my phone and seeing who responds.

Question 3: What do I do for the people I don't have time to see?  A vast majority of you will only be able to contact me via the internet and I have a rather spotty record with that medium.  I am trying to get better and I hope I will soon be a more reliable person.  Or at least the same level of reliability I had 4 years ago.

Many of you have pointed to the fact that I no longer comment on LJs.  Which is true.  Since 9/18/2001 I have post 384 times, received 1,039 Comments, and commented myself a paltry 702.  So, a promise to you all.  At least for this entry I am listening.  Voice your grievances.

I keep having all these conversations with Becca about all my issues which basically leaves my urge to discuss them with the rest of the world drained, and well this just isn't right for all of you that long to read what it is that I have to say...

College is a system for control.  In this system a series of measures of a person are taken with the overall goal of determining the value of said individual to society.  The Ultimate goal of course is to make a good middle class corperate worker.  There is nothing wrong with this system except that at one point it was the undergraduate degree that showed the world that a person was educated beyond the trappings of the system.  Now that has gone by the way side.  This is not the matter to be disputed.  The reasons are perhaps more interesting.  The list of possible reasons is what should be suggested here.

They are a waste of space for the most part.  I frequently tell people that I am an Humanist.  By this I mean that I am opposed to the entire idea of humanity.  Now before this bit of tyraid continues I want to make a few things clear.  I am not talking the its cool to hate everyone, or the jaded angry hurt teenager, or even the the world has treated me like shit.  No flat out people are the worst mistake evolution has ever made.  I will no begin to make a list of the mistakes.  As per usual your comments, concerns, disagreements are welcome.  

1: People lie about stupid shit, how hard is this question "what's wrong"
NOthing difficult about that at all.  Instead we all say we are fine or "Nothing".  WHAT THE FUCK IS THAT.

2: People activily try to take from other people all the time.  Someone is about to get married I bet you 10 bucks that someone they know trys to them not too.  And let me say the reasons are not cause you don't want them to get hurt.  Nine times out of ten you can't trust the words out of peoples mouths.

3: People don't care about anything that can't see feel or touch. There is always this "back in my day" bull shit that people claim its just the current generation.  But seriously people no ever fucking cares about the abstract.  You didn't see a victorian movement to save the rivers and streams cause they were limitless... just as today, no one is actually trying to save anything till it actually runs out

4: WE spend our entire lives looking for someone, we find that someone an then we go to our friends and bitch about them... or worse we spend time trying to find someone else.  How FUCKING STUPID DO YOU HAVE TO BE TO SEE WE ARE A WASTE OF SPACE AIR WATER CARBON

5: NOthing we do lasts, even the pyrimids are decaying

6: Nothing we do matters, can anyone out there name the man that first stopped the muslim horde allowing for christianity to spread, allowing for the hitler, stalin, communism, democracy, race based slavery, (1000 other nasty things the Good Book has inspired should be inserted here)

7: Religion PERIOD

8: Yeah I am just going to stop now, cause I really want more imput...

If this were true then someone explain this particular news story Here Does the BBC have nothing further to report. Now some of you might say this is just one of those character stories they do to show they are still just one of the guys. This would hold water, except that this was on the front page along with such stories as the United Korean Olympic Team. This is why the rest of the world thinks that American's are nothing more then a bunch of fat people, who care only about themselves. I am not one to give credit where it isn't due, and CNN isn't any better today with every single one of thier stories either being on the United States or Bird Flue. But at least we don't report on pizza robbery. Anyway I guess thats my issue for today. I would say more but I want to know what everyone else out there thinks

From here forward you should all know that I am only going to be using this thing for one thing.  Politics and Issues discourse.  To define discourse: Comments are required, as I am a college student and have some level of rational thought I expect that everyone involved will take this for what it is.  Don't make this into what you think my opinions are because well it simply isn't.  Many of you already know that I can argue any point so long as I see value in challenging the standard.

So I shall end this journal with a final thought....

I am at peace with who I am

If you are not...

Your lose

I dedicate this to everyone out there who reads this, in the last days of 
I don't know how many of you are in the shadows.  I don't know how many of you are in the open.

Although these are just simple words, they may help you to understand things. 
Then again I have always said even I don't understand my poems

There he stands, completely clad in shadow.
Villanious at first sight, and tormented beyond.
Endless and foul ambition, let none stand in his way
A cloak hides features, none will understand
Faces tell so little, lest you see deep
His less so, for every emotion is shielded
Those shown through, trust only in dire straight
Walking ever on has worn, tireless pain follows
Something so strong, never willing to let be
Trys to block out all, yet can't keep in
Ripped to shreads, inner demons haunt
who is he, why does he come.
no moon or sun does shine, only foggy tempest
Tremendous joy never felt, but demanded no matter
what can't be demand must be forever granted, so say we
Those he hurts on his journey, have never known him
resent all he does posses, forever on we shall tarry after
never peace will be granted, none is deserved
struggles will he overcome, only to be replaced
lifes eternal struggle, played out in one man
ego and pride tis it called, but those with out shouldn't talk
Every single in wake are bleeding, for time is noones friend
and he will be slowed by none, friend or foe.
What sought may be worth naught, matters little seeking will not stop
the cloaked man, walkes ever on into shadow
will you know this shadow man, or fea and walk against
The shadows rise, will he step
indeed gone, soon
time is pressing onward, and the man will not relent
A pheonix is also on his trail, light and dark to mix
The Sabre Tooth Squirel is my Avaitar.

What is the mother of all fuck ups?

"Hello"
"Hello"
"You owe me an explanation, and it better be a good one"
"Who is this?"
"Dave"
"What are you talking about"
"Why are you telling my ex-girlfriend that I am sleeping with your ex-girlfriend"
"Uh,.. I have to go"

Ten Minutes later
*knock, knock, knock*
*long pause, observe person looking through peep hole*
*Door unlocks, _____ stands there looking at me*
"All I am asking for is an explanation"
*____ closes door*
*Get in car*
*Drive away*


You sir, are a coward, you simply had to explain yourself, but no you couldn't or wouldn't either way, count your blessing.  I don't want to see you, hear you, know you, or anything beyond that.  You claim so many friend like things, yet somehow come off like an asshole everytime.  I wonder if you would like it if other people meddled in your life this much.

There is more I would say, but in short "GO FUCK YOURSELF"

To those of you not involved the names of the involved have been removed, because I do not wish to meddle in the lives of others, I merely wanted to point out that I was displeased.  If you do know who I am talking about great, I hope you dispise the person as much as I do.

Disclaimer: I am not peachy keen no matter what you think

The cage is all around me
If feels like nothing I can discribe
but it keeps me from using myself
every emotion denied to me
What I am feeling I just don't know
Sometimes I wish i could free myself
open the door and just step out
but that simply isn't allowed 
society won't allow such things


nevermind its hollow and empty with no real point.  The basic idea is taht i don't know what I am feeling.  TO further add to this, I can't ask anyone for help, because no one out there can help.  I am the one that made my situation and I have to live with it.  At some point I need to get it through my thick skull that I am a rotten person.  Depression is setting in with a vengence now.  What I will do i do not know

Good day

Say what you will

Brick and Mortor
Stong of mason's hand
built and crafted
only to stand

One act of free will
by a artisan in this
did create a wounderous leak
so small that none found it
the artisan walked way
knowning his damage done
soon the whole of the guild would know

Out marches the rains
they pound the sides
drench the foundation
weaken the shutters
causing leaks and cracks
slowly the water recedes
except what foundation trapped

Then came winter cold and bitter
full of discord and mistrust
wanting its own vengence on the home
it froze what the rain did start
foundations first crack 
brought by mason, rain, and snow
crumbling begins true

The guild return
in bonded brotherhood
to mend the damage rent
and so it was done
Why not just tell me what you are thinking?

Anti-Americanism: Censored by the F.C.C. and the Moralistic Movement of America

Disclaimer: The following is going to be a tirade about everything that is bothering me with the current political and global environment, no matter how strongly I state something, I hope you will take the time to respond.  Even I know that I must have my beliefs questioned.  What I am saying here is I would like a debate to spawn.
To Dispel Rumors: I do not any further attempts by the United States to go to war with any nation until we have made good on our promises to the good people of Afghanistan & Iraq.  If the Administration's current agenda toward Iran & North Korea lead toward war I will surely be among the first to protest.  That being said I did & do support the United States efforts in Afghanistan.  I supported the invasion of Iraq, but for the wrong reasons.  I did/do believe that there are/were weapons that Iraq's government had no right to.  However going to war to disarm someone is like shooting someone in the head to stop the brain from hemorrhaging, yeah it works, but it isn't pretty.  We should have gone to war to stop the atrocities Saddam was committing.  I blame George HW. Bush for first helping put that man in power and for failing to remove him once he proved himself a menace.  I blame William Clinton for being so busy cultivating his image that he couldn't make the effort to actually use the military he was in command of (if you want a long list of his miscarriages of justice, both militarily and domestically just ask).  Lastly I blame George W. Bush for his complete incompetence in giving the right reasons for the war.  All that being said we should have gone in, and even if we shouldn't have it doesn't matter we must stay the course now.  If we don't and we just pull out as huge sums of people say we should then we will be only further weakening our own moral values which brings me to the point of this whole damnable entry.
Moralism: I heard a woman today on the radio saying "What right does the United States have to go to war with another country?"  At first this question is simple to answer.  Obvious morals dictate that the answer is none.  Duh!  Let us re-examine shall we.  The sovereign free nation of England drops off Peacekeeping forces in Boston, withholds any reason, and takes control of the local government.  "What right does the United States have to go to war with another country?"   Total and undeniable right would be the answer in this situation.  The kingdom of Belgium is happily enjoying its Christmas when it hears over the radio; "Forces from Germany have been spotted sweeping through all major entries into the country".  "What right does the United States have to go to war with another country?"  China has decided to block all trade to the United States and Canada.  "What right does the United States have to go to war with another country?"  What I am getting at is that this question is stupid because it can be turned to either light.  Furthermore, it can be turned to either light in either case.  For each of these I can present the same point another way that would take a different approach.  Simply put the United States is a free nation just like other free nations it has the right to go to war when ever it wants.  If you think for a moment that it doesn't you are sadly mistaken.  Think about it for a time, what prevents us from going to war... nothing except our own will?  Yeah, the UN could impose sanctions, WTO could call for trade bans, and France could bitch about it, but that change nothing.  The right to go to war is the choice of the sovereign nation that makes the decision.  These people that ask the question "What right does the United States have to go to war with anther country?" are just plain silly.

DON'T FUCKING MEDDLE IN MY LIFE

Here I sit
Enjoying red starch
and darker grape
pondering with heart
a life today
was mine worth
did keep earn
good turn daily
twice to repeat
no selfish thought
nore fogotten tithe
subtle throaty sting
happy healthy feast
bubbles in self
vermin simple die
what good done
what evil wrought
till sun rise
nought to know
friends left astray
confidants brought to
nevermind lost mind
lest you fray
understand not I
nor even you
drink down red
deep stark red
red of blood
tingle down toward
glorious vile red
torment body soul
reak vile death
new life too
forgiven forgotten asleep

For anyone who doesn't know the title the next passage will make little or no sense.  

*Flying onward faster into the murk I drive, trying desperately to see in front of me.  During the old times when Strahd passed through he would have noted that he wouldn't be able to see his hand an inch from his face.  I myself passed through those mists last night.  In this time of modern things we don't like to think that there might actaully be a nether realm where demons lurk and vampire rule, but there is.  I know I saw it last night.  Here is that story.

Down Hwy 59 at a speed of maybe 60 mph hour my ebony contour races into the murk.  At first I think nothing of it, other then simple fog.  I call a friend to talk me through the long drive, however after a few short moments the line goes dead and no signal will come forth.  This I find truely odd, as I have driven this route for nearly 6 months and never once lost my mystical connection that US Cellular offered me.  I curse the demons that wrought my acursed phone and throw it to the ground.  Suddenly a wall of fog so dense I can't see beyond loomes ahead.  My inner monologue says "BAH, I am Dave no force of nature, nore will of man will stop me."  I lunge deeper into the dense suspended water.  Where Strahd had failed I would not, after all I had edison's miracle on my side.  

There is of course more I would like to write but unlike larry or anyone else for that matter, i am just not creative

You know those people who have nothing better to do then to butt into other peoples lives and spell disruption.  Some of them are simply fucked in the head and repeat what they hear and see, while others are out right blatent about it.  These people are the worse of the two, they hack into peoples computers, they assult peoples privacy.  They have no regard for the welfare of others.  To them life is without control.  So since they have no control of thier own lives, they choose instead to see if they can't manipulate the actions of other in a vain attempt at control
The list of these people is long in my life as I'm sure it is in most peoples lives.  I would like to go into detail about them, but I won't since to be honest some of them are your friends.  I don't wish to exert that kind of control.  I do have control of my life and my actions.  I know what will happen to me from one day to the next.  I don't really know how it is that people don't, but such is the case.  I will leave you all to the wonders of pondering this entry.

I personally want everyone out there who chooses to meddle in my life, to know that my reprisal will go deeper then words, if I lose control of my life I WILL react, and the source of the problem will pay.

I looked around at my friends Journals, and my own.  I noticed alot of things.  I see that I and others have forgotten something in all of this.  Ourselves.  I myself posted more entries in the past twenty-four hours then in three months.  The election was and is beyond important to me.  I read reports from liberals, conservatives, and moderates.  I tried everything I could to be a truely informed voter.  I hoped and I prayed that I could make a valuable choice.  No amount of campaigning on either side was going to sway my vote, nore were any of the 527 groups.  
I listened also to the voice of my friends, the minority of which are liberal.  I again tried to see all the perspectives.  I extoled my point of view while they did the same.  I would like to take a moment and commend two people who made a point not only to be involved, but to express thier views with integrity, honor, and heart.  
Larry: I can honestly feel your pain, I hate the feeling I have about the future of this country.  I love it with every bit of my being and will continue to do so, but it does dishearten me to have another friend who so longs to leave a nation that allows out ideas so unfettered.   I care about your opinion and although I rarely agree I appreciate your point of view.
Nick: May the spirits save me from your point of views.  Sometimes they outright scare me, but you present them without need to change my mind on it, and you let me express my view.  Over the years I have seen you change and learn and diverge and ascend, and all while remaining on the same basic course.  I think that you would make a wonderful politician though, I hope you never do.  You force me to work harder to see the truth, and to watch closer for the lies.  I thank you for that and so much more.
I do not measure up to these two, and to be honest I don't think any of us do.  I read all our entries, and in the continuing intrest of moderation and information, I read journals of people I didn't even know.  I railed and attacked a friend of mine, for no good reason, I supported my choice without anyone knowing what it was.  Simply put we need to work together to keep this system alive and kicking, if you don't like Bush, don't wait 4 years, there are small elections all the time, and believe me they add up.  Bush couldn't do a thing if he didn't control the House, Senete, and half the governors in the country.
Friends and loved ones, put down your banners and agendas, and lets make this community of our, ours again
